description: This file contains network repository implementations for an Android app, handling data fetching from APIs with error handling and default fallbacks. It defines classes for content, metadata, assets, and rating repositories, along with utility functions for safe coroutine execution.

classes.name: NetworkContentRepository
classes.description: Repository providing content data from network API with fallback defaults.

classes.name: NetworkMetadataRepository
classes.description: Repository fetching metadata like indice copy and rating settings with default fallbacks.

classes.name: NetworkAssetsRepository
classes.description: Repository for assets, specifically instruction images, with error handling.

classes.name: NetworkRatingRepository
classes.description: Repository managing like status of content, interfacing with LikesApi.

methods.name: getHomeSections
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches list of home section strings, with default fallback.

methods.name: getContentInfo
methods.description: Fetches content information for a given ID from network API; returns default if fails.

methods.name: getIndiceCopy
methods.description: Retrieves indice copy data, with a default constructed from resources if network fails.

methods.name: getVodRatingSettings
methods.description: Retrieves VOD rating settings from network, with default fallback values.

methods.name: getInstructionImages
methods.description: Returns instruction images, attempting network fetch but defaulting on failure.

methods.name: isLiked
methods.description: Checks if content is liked, with error tolerance and default false.

methods.name: setLike
methods.description: Sets the like status for content, with default true on error.
